name: CRYPT of FATE - the roll playing game
name_original: CRYPT of FATE - the roll playing game
description:
Crypt of Fate is a local multiplayer game where 1 to 4 players explore the Crypt of Fate with an unexpected hero and try to collect more stars than their opponents

Project carried out in 48h as part of our participation to Wonderjam UQAC- Autumn 2022

Theme : « It’s not a glitch, it’s a feature »

Style constraints : 
-Tabletop 
-Chance
-Turn-based

Created by Totema and Friends: 
-François Dessureault 
-Gabriel Le Breton
-Samuel Taillon
-Kim Desrosiers
